department.en: Institute of Materials Science and Engineering
department.ch: 材料科學與工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: “This course provides the graduate students different points of view to realize another microstructure of metallic materials, non-crystalline structure (amorphous) via the interpretation of crystallography physics theories, synthesis process, and application potential.“
goal.ch: “讓同學進一步了解各種非晶質合金(金屬玻璃)之微結構、合成方法、加工製程、材料特性及可應用領域, 做為未來工業應用之基礎。“

content.en: “The content of this course includes the basic theories of forming amorphous metallic alloy, glass forming ability, characterization methods of glassy phase, crystallization behavior of metallic glasses, characteristics and properties of metallic glass, classification of metallic glasses, synthesis of metallic glasses, special forming process and potential applications of metallic glasses.“
content.ch: 非晶質合金主要之講授內容涵蓋有非晶質合金之基本介紹、非晶質合金之合成原理及、玻璃形成能力要件、非晶質合金之檢驗方法、非晶質合金之結晶行為、非晶質合金之性質、非晶質合金之種類、合成方法、特硃殊加工特性及可能之應用範圍。

textbook.en: “1. Bulk Metallic glasses, edited by Michael Miller and Peter Liaw, Springer Science + Business Media LLC (2008). 2. Bulk Metallic Glasses, edited by C. Suryanarayana and A. Inoue, CRCPress, Taylor ＆ Francis Group (2011) 3. Hand out and Journal paper“
textbook.ch: “1. Bulk Metallic glasses, edited by Michael Miller and Peter Liaw, Springer Science + Business Media LLC (2008). 2. Bulk Metallic Glasses, edited by C. Suryanarayana and A. Inoue, CRCPress, Taylor ＆ Francis Group (2011) 3. Hand out and Journal papers“

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.en: “Mid-term assigned reading report 30％, Final assigned topic experimental report 30％, and Final oral presentation of assigned experiment 40％“
grading.ch: 期中專題閱讀心得口頭報告30％、期末專題實驗書面報告30％及期末專題實驗口頭報告40％

flex_desc.en: The last two weeks provide students to make up the assigned experiment and oral presentation.
flex_desc.ch: 最後二週供學生補做專題實驗及口頭報告

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments
